item.title: Becoming Steve Jobs by Brent Schlender
item.description: Becoming Steve Jobs by Brent Schlender is a well-written biography of Steve Jobs & is definitely much better than Walter Isaacson’s ‘official’ one! And yeah, it is much more than a boring compendium of wiki and news articles. :) So, happy reading!
